rule.name: accessevent

rule.example: Suppose you want Profile Type1 users cannot access event of profile type2/ 1.General Parameter-> Self Profiletype to apply rule -> Select Profile Type1 /2.Rule Parameters-> Other profiletype users to apply rule -> Select Profile Type2
